name: 10-game-divtober-2022
title: 10. Game - Divtober 2022
description: This entry was an attempt at trying to do something simple but polished, a respite from some of the complex versions I have been working on the first week of divtober.
js: /* This entry was an attempt at trying to do something simple but polished, a respite from some of the complex versions I have been working on the first week of divtober.
